ai-pli-tv-pvr1.13:1.1_0: having sexual intercourse, but only for six sense fields stem from their families?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.13:1.2_0: Having sexual intercourse, he stems from the six sense fields that emerging from disord:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.13:1.3_0: They don’t make the body and speech, and the mind. ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.13:2.1_0: her, out of disrespect, defecate, urinate, or spit in water, or spit on the ground, or sphere in water?
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.13:2.2_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, or spits on the ground, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.13:2.3_0: They don’t covet the body and the mind from the body. ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.13:3.1_0: The fifth section consisting of probation is finished.
